scripts.start: start npm run start:api & start npm run start:mvc
scripts.test: npm run test:api & npm run test:application & npm run test:infrastructure & npm run test:mvc & npm run test:persistence
scripts.install: npm run install:src & npm run install:test
scripts.install:src: npm run install:api & npm run install:application & npm run install:infrastructure & npm run install:persistence & npm run install:mvc
scripts.install:test: npm run install:api:test & npm run install:application:test & npm run install:infrastructure:test & npm run install:persistence:test & npm run install:mvc:test & npm run install:test:infrastructure
